## Overview

TEKKEN 7 is a popular fighting game developed by Bandai Namco that was released in 2017. It is the ninth installment in the TEKKEN series and features a diverse cast of characters, breathtaking graphics, and a challenging gameplay experience.

## Game Modes

TEKKEN 7 offers several game modes for players to choose from including:

### Story Mode

The game's story mode follows the Mishima clan's battle for control of a powerful corporation. This mode features cinematic cutscenes and battles against iconic characters from the TEKKEN series.

### Arcade Mode

Arcade mode is a classic TEKKEN game mode that allows players to battle their way through a set amount of opponents to reach the final boss.

### Treasure Mode

In Treasure mode, players battle random opponents to earn currency and unlock new customization items for their characters.

### Online Play

TEKKEN 7 also offers online play with ranked and casual match options.

## Characters

One of the best features of TEKKEN 7 is its diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique fighting styles and special moves.  The roster includes fan favorites like Heihachi Mishima, Kazuya Mishima, Nina Williams, and Jin Kazama, as well as new characters such as Lucky Chloe and Shaheen.

## Graphics

TEKKEN 7 features stunning graphics that truly showcase the game's beautiful character designs and intricate stages. The game also includes beautiful lighting and particle effects which enhance the gameplay experience.

## Gameplay

The game's mechanics are a blend of classic TEKKEN gameplay with new mechanics like Rage Arts, which are powerful special moves that can be unleashed when a character's health is low. The game features a deep combat system that rewards players for mastering the game's mechanics.

## Conclusion

TEKKEN 7 is a fighting game that truly delivers on all levels, with an extensive cast of characters, breathtaking graphics, and a challenging gameplay experience. Whether you're a fan of the series or a newcomer, TEKKEN 7 is definitely worth checking out.
